entries.content:
Moti introduced himself and provided comprehensive context about the Semantix project. Key points:
- Building VS Code extension transforming Qwen Code terminal experience into visual/collaborative interface
- Real-time streaming with thinking indicators, permission system, designer controls
- Multi-state architecture with recent permission dialog bug fix
- Semantic memory system integrated
- Three memory types: Semantic (long-term), Notebook (session notes), Delta (achievements)
- Project goal: Make AI assistance feel like true pair programming with transparency
